name: Captain Clown's Adventure
description:
Captain Clown Adventure Welcome folks, to Palm Tree Island! Captain Skully has been shipwrecked here. Can you help him escape and find treasure along the way?

–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––-----------------------

INSTRUCTIONS - [WAD] or [ARROW] keys to move - [SPACE] or [E] to progress text and swing your blade! - Can you make it through the island without losing all your health?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If people like this i will make a part 2
